long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Engage AI is an AI-driven tool designed to automate social media engagement. It helps you build your audience by automatically commenting on posts, allowing you to stay active and visible on platforms like Facebook without manually responding to each post. Engage AI analyzes the content of posts and generates relevant, thoughtful comments that can spark conversations and increase your visibility.

The tool is in its beta testing phase, and users can provide feedback to improve its performance.
